name: Tower of BOOM
description:
Aliens are attacking us. Humanity's last hope is a lone ranger on his quest to curb the alien menace and .........yada yada yada.......

You don't need the details. Just go out there and kill em all !!!!!

Made for Ludum dare 46 where the theme was "Keep it alive". Each floor in the game is procedurally generated. Keep your Combo Counter alive for as long as possible and fight off the alien menace.

Controls:

E  :  Exit game (Windows version)

Left and Right arrow  :  Movement

Down arrow  :  Destroy the floor panel below you

Up arrow   :  Jump and also destroy a floor panel above you

X  :  hold down X to shoot

C  :  Throw a grenade

Esc : Pause the game
